title: Morricone
content:
[Morricone](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018101658/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0259) is a new gun with its own tune. After looking at some old exxamples of egyptian and italian slabs, I sketched out some letters that reduced the negative space between slabs and strokes. With some additional abstraction, Morricone took shape.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018101658im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Morricone_specimen_4772.jpg)
author: IAmMintCondition
